TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit StandardCommands extends System.Object

summary.span: 定义可用于大多数应用程序的标准命令集的标识符。

span.span: Defines identifiers for the standard set of commands that are available to most applications.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类定义可供设计器的标准命令的标识符。This class defines identifiers for standard commands that are available to designers. 从命令添加类到设计器的菜单上，必须调用方法并添加包含从。To add a command from the class to a designer menu, you must call the method of an and add a that contains a from . ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何将添加的成员类到以及如何添加到。The following code example illustrates how to add a member of the class to a and how to add the to an . [!code-cpp[MenuCommand Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/MenuCommand Example/CPP/component1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[MenuCommand Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/MenuCommand Example/CS/component1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[MenuCommand Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/MenuCommand Example/VB/component1.vb#1)]

permission.span: 对系统资源的完全访问权限。

span.span: for full access to system resources.
Demand values: , .

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID VerbFirst
Public Shared ReadOnly VerbFirst As CommandID

summary.span: 获取一组谓词中的第一个。

span.span: Gets the first of a set of verbs.
This field is read-only.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这是一个特殊标识的一套设计器谓词的第一个。This is a special that identifies the first of a set of designer verbs. Visual Studio Windows 窗体设计器会自动映射到设计器谓词属性，因此通常不需要访问此命令。The Visual Studio Windows Forms Designer automatically maps designer verbs to the property on , so generally you do not need to access this command. 对象的所有设计器谓词成为具有命令内顺序 Id 的范围开头和结束的。All designer verbs for an object become commands with a within a sequential range of IDs that begins with and ends with .

Public Shared ReadOnly VerbLast As CommandID

This field is read-only.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这是一个特殊标识的一套设计器谓词的最后一个。This is a special that identifies the last of a set of designer verbs. Visual Studio Windows 窗体设计器会自动映射到设计器谓词属性，因此通常不需要访问此命令。The Visual Studio Windows Forms Designer automatically maps designer verbs to the property on , so generally you do not need to access this command. 对象的所有设计器谓词成为具有命令内顺序 Id 的范围开头和结束的。All designer verbs for an object become commands with a within a sequential range of IDs that begins with and ends with .
